revised_title: Electrification of Air, of Vapour of Water, and of Other Gases: Experiments and Methods
tldr: The authors investigate the electrification of air, vapor of water, and other gases through various methods and experiments. They discover that air and other gases become electrified when bubbled through water or solutions of salts, acids, and alkalies. The authors also develop and test electric filters to measure the electrification and diselectrification of air.
